variable.name: COM34A
variable.description: Average number of times per week (7-day period) patient performs the following kinds of exercise for more than 15 minutes (during their free time): strenuous exercise

variable.name: COM34B
variable.description: Average number of times per week (7-day period) patient performs the following kinds of exercise for more than 15 minutes (during their free time): moderate exercise

variable.name: COM34C
variable.description: Average number of times per week (7-day period) patient performs the following kinds of exercise for more than 15 minutes (during their free time): mild exercise

variable.name: COM35
variable.description: Average number of times in a week (7-day period) patient engages in any regular activity long enough to produce a sweat and increase heart rate (during their free time)

variable.name: COM36
variable.description: Average number of people living in patients household (excluding patient)

variable.name: COM36A
variable.description: Number of people living with the patient in the following age groups: "Less than or equal 3 years"

variable.name: COM36B
variable.description: Number of people living with the patient in the following age groups: "4-10 years old"

variable.name: COM36C
variable.description: Number of people living with the patient in the following age groups: "11-18 years old"

variable.name: COM36D
variable.description: Number of people living with the patient in the following age groups: "19 years and older"

variable.name: COM37
variable.description: Number of people living with the patient in the following age groups: "Patient's yearly income"

variable.name: COM38
variable.description: Total combined yearly income of people who provide patient with financial support
variable.value: Not financially supported by someone else

variable.name: COM39
variable.description: Patient's highest level of education

variable.name: COM40
variable.description: Highest level of education completed by people providing patient with financial support
variable.value: Not financially supported by someone else

variable.name: COM41
variable.description: Does the patient have any pets? If "yes" see COM41A.

variable.description: Dogs

variable.name: COM41A1B
variable.description: Dogs - # of pets

variable.name: COM41A2A
